name: The Lizartian
description:
The storm is coming young Lizartian and you have to be prepared...

The Lizartian is a top-down action and adventure game in which we will have to explore the distant lands of Dekoto, making our way through bandits and looters.

You can move around the Dekoto fighting to get resources, unlock routes by performing special confrontations.

When you face the bandits use your machine gun to destroy their ships and if they board you use your ax to get rid of them... and be aware of the life of your lizard!!!
